data.message: This was posted 39 mins ago and already has over 325,000 views. Say what you want about the cypher. Say what you want about Em, but people still want to hear what he wants to say.

replies.message: no I stopped  pretty much at the beginning after I seen this was a full of shit pussy ass political fake ass statement

Tim Mcgill fair enough. My point is you still began to watch it. You also scrolled the comments to see what others had to say. He is still relevant enough to cause a stir. Like I said, like it or not people still want to see what he had to say. lol

We heard him loud and clear but his ridiculous statements won’t change anyone’s opinion or stance on Trump.  This is just a bunch of hot air.  More divisive comments to help keep our nation divided.  Staying on the #trumptrain #MAGA
Fake streams and views. These are bought.
Chris White seems you need to figure out why you're on the Trump train. Ironic that you mentioned divisive comments - isn't that all Trump tweets?
Say the guy from India? Please.tell me what Trump has personally done to you Abhijeet Bharguv lmao

I don’t need to figure anything out Monique Navarro.  Although you might want to figure out why you aren’t on the #trumptrain.  Turn off #CNN and do your own research.  You might be surprised what you learn.
